page.title: 07LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: In our free time we do many different things. Five people at school have {computers}and spend a lot of time playing with them. One or two children make their own programs.{Football}is a popular game and we play it at school in the playground. The two girls in our class spend a lot of time with horses.{Swimming}is also enjoyed by most but we have to go to Turriff or Huntly to do this. The children here enjoy collecting things.{Stamps, {bottles, lorries, old model cars}are examples.{Cycling}is popular and nearly every child has a bike. A lot of people like{pop music.}There is a lot of good music in the charts. Every body likes pets. Cats and dogs are the favourite. {JAMES HUNTER (age 10)
